import React from'react';import'./Testimonials.css';import Data from'./TestimonialData';import{Swiper,SwiperSlide}from"swiper/react";// Import Swiper styles
import'swiper/css';import'swiper/css/pagination';import{Pagination}from'swiper';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Testimonials(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"testimonial container section",id:"testimonials",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section__title",children:"My Clients say"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"section__subtitle",children:"Testimonial"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Swiper,{className:"testimonial__container",grabCursor:true,loop:true,spaceBetween:24,pagination:{clickable:true},breakpoints:{578:{slidesPerView:1,spaceBetween:20},768:{slidesPerView:2,spaceBetween:20}},modules:[Pagination],children:Data.map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(SwiperSlide,{className:"testimonial__card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.img,alt:"",className:"testimonial__img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"testimonial__name",children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"testimonial__description",children:item.description})]},item.id);})})]});}export default Testimonials;
